document.full_text: not for the first time this season, the miami heat have been accused of celebrating too soon -- this time with nba finals rivals the dallas mavericks saying premature jubilation inspired their game two comeback win.
document.title: mavs get fire in the belly from heat's early celebrations
lines_and_colors: not for the first time this season, the miami heat have been accused of celebrating too soon -- this time with nba finals rivals the dallas mavericks saying premature jubilation inspired their game two comeback win.
